feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:40 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy mixed with snow squalls this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
